class.name: minestar.production.domain.chute.ChuteTimeLineRecord
class.meta: A historical record of when the status of a chute changed.

many-to-one.name: chute
many-to-one.meta: A reference to the chute (MSMODEL.MACHINE) that this record applies to.

property.name: name
property.meta: The name of the status that the chute changed to.

property.name: comments
property.meta: The comments about the status that the chute changed to.

property.name: colorRed
property.meta: The red value of the color used to represent this status.

property.name: colorGreen
property.meta: The green value of the color used to represent this status.

property.name: colorBlue
property.meta: The blue value of the color used to represent this status.

property.name: oldName
property.meta: The name of the status that the chute changed from.

property.name: oldComments
property.meta: The comments about the status that the chute changed from.

property.name: oldColorRed
property.meta: The red value of the color used to represent the last status.

property.name: oldColorGreen
property.meta: The green value of the color used to represent the last status.

property.name: oldColorBlue
property.meta: The blue value of the color used to represent the last status.
